1.m_mDesc: "After every attack, the following attack will target the nearest eligible unit within the specified range of the hit target."

2.m_mDesc: "Teleports without being affected by movement-impairing effects."

3.m_mDesc: "A unit summoned into battle who disappears when the caster dies."

4.m_mDesc: "A type of DMG that is neither Physical nor Magic. Requires 200% Shield Strength to resist."

6.m_mDesc: "Quickly moves towards selected target or direction. Cannot be targeted during this effect."

7.m_mDesc: "Lifesteal: Converts a portion of damage dealt into HP recovery."

8.m_mDesc: "A channeled spell with a long cast time. Interruption cancels any effects."

9.m_mDesc: "Purifies the most recently applied debuff or Control effect of the same type."

10.m_mDesc: "DMG dealt by this Vassal varies with range. It increases by up to 50% at the farthest target while decreasing by up to 50% at the target nearby."

20080.m_mDesc: "A summon that performs Basic ATK on enemies ahead in a cone. Only 1 can exist at the same time."

20081.m_mDesc: "A summon that performs Basic ATK. Only 3 can exist at the same time."

20140.m_mDesc: "Summons up to 2 units that perform Basic ATKs on Spectral Gilrain's target."

20270.m_mDesc: "Summons up to 3 units. When 2 present, their Basic ATK turns into a beam, DMG Up by 20%. When 3 present, their Basic ATK can <link=Tips_ID;1><#508499><u>Bounce</u></color></link> up to 3 times."

20350.m_mDesc: "Purifies all debuffs and fully restores HP."

20390.m_mDesc: "A summon that performs ranged Basic ATK in sync with Transcendent Noah. Only 5 can exist at the same time."

20400.m_mDesc: "Basic ATK targets all enemies in a circle around the target. This form ends when all stacks of Swift Hunt are consumed."

20420.m_mDesc: "Basic ATK transforms into an electrified circular saw. ATK SPD is increased during this time."
